tc_games.app_data:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:VirtualDirectories" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>1</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[SubAdminFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Sub Admin Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>2</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[ResellerFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>Reseller Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <PermissionMode>Basic</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>Root</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>ReadFile WriteFile DeleteFile RenameFile ListDirectory CreateDirectory DeleteDirectory RenameDirectory</Permissions>
 <ServerId>3</ServerId>
 <RootPhysicalPath>$[UserFiles]</RootPhysicalPath>
 <VirtualDirectoryName>User Files</VirtualDirectoryName>
 <AdditionalPermissions>
 <VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 <Filters>*.exe;*.dll;*.so;*.bat;*.sh;*.cmd;*.vbs;*.pif;*.scr;*.com</Filters>
 <PermissionMode>None</PermissionMode>
 <PermissionType>File</PermissionType>
 <Permissions>None</Permissions>
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
 </AdditionalPermissions>
 </VirtualDirectorySecurity>
</ArrayOfVirtualDirectorySecurity>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.VirtualFileSystem.VirtualDirectorySecurity[],TCAdmin.SDK" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATED_ON" value="2011-07-27 15:55:55" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:NOTES" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="d3b2aa93-7e2b-4e0d-8080-67d14b2fa8a9:FileManager" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?>
<FileManagerConfig xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
 <ServerId>0</ServerId>
 <EditPatterns>
 <string>*.cfg</string>
 <string>*.txt</string>
 <string>*.ini</string>
 </EditPatterns>
 <MaxEditSize>102400</MaxEditSize>
 <EnableDecompress>true</EnableDecompress>
 <EnableCompress>true</EnableCompress>
 <MaxCompressSize>52428800</MaxCompressSize>
 <EnableUpload>true</EnableUpload>
 <EnableDownload>true</EnableDownload>
 <DefaultFileName>custom.cfg</DefaultFileName>
 <WriteBom>false</WriteBom>
</FileManagerConfig>" type="TCAdmin.SDK.Web.FileManager.FileManagerConfig,TCAdmin.SDK.Web" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_BY" value="3" type="System.Int32,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:MODIFIED_ON" value="2012-12-20 00:56:32" type="System.DateTime,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:V1_GAME_ID" value="" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="__TCA:CREATE_SYMLINK" value="False" type="System.Boolean,mscorlib" /> </values>

tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_default: +set game ctf +set hostip $[Service.IpAddress] +set hostport $[Service.GamePort] +set dedicated 1 +exec sinctf.cfg
tc_game_cmdlines.cmdline_private: +set game ctf +set hostip $[Service.IpAddress] +set hostport $[Service.GamePort] +set dedicated 1 +exec sinctf.cfg
tc_game_cmdlines.predef_cmdlines: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <PredefinedCommandLine> <Id>db98b91e-286b-4adf-961e-b1c1d768d90a</Id> <CommandLine>+set game ctf +set hostip $[Service.IpAddress] +set hostport $[Service.GamePort] +set dedicated 1 +exec sinctf.cfg</CommandLine> <Description>Default</Description> </PredefinedCommandLine> </ArrayOfPredefinedCommandLine>

tc_game_config_files.template: set sv_appid 1309 set maxclients $[Service.Slots] set hostname "$[HostName]" set ctf 1 set deathmatch 1 set capturelimit ![caplimit1] set allow_download 1 set sv_maplist "ctf_spry,ctf_kungfu,ctf_hip,ctf_brafish,ctf_para,ctf_zor,ctf_fetus,ctf_dig" map ![map1]

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Mode" value="SingleLine" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Server Hostname - sets the server name as it will appear in the STEAM list.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Source" value="CustomList" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_spry</Value><DisplayText>Spry</DisplayText><Selected>true</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_kungfu</Value><DisplayText>Kung Fu</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_hip</Value><DisplayText>Hip</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_brafish</Value><DisplayText>Brafish</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_para</Value><DisplayText>Para</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_zor</Value><DisplayText>Zor</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_fetus</Value><DisplayText>Fetus</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>ctf_dig</Value><DisplayText>Dig</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem></ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Starting Map - sets the map the server will startup on.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Source" value="CustomList" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>1</Value><DisplayText>1</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>2</Value><DisplayText>2</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>3</Value><DisplayText>3</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>4</Value><DisplayText>4</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>5</Value><DisplayText>5</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>5</Value><DisplayText>5</DisplayText><Selected>true</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem></ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
tc_dynamic_form_items.description: Capture Limit - sets the cature limit per game.

tc_dynamic_form_items.item_config: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16" standalone="yes"?> <values> <add key="Source" value="CustomList" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> <add key="CustomList" value="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>1</Value><DisplayText>Yes</DisplayText><Selected>true</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem><CustomDataSourceItem><Value>0</Value><DisplayText>No</DisplayText><Selected>false</Selected></CustomDataSourceItem></ArrayOfCustomDataSourceItem>" type="System.String,mscorlib" /> </values>
